creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: standing woman wearing flowing garment and head scarf, with PL hand on chest, in controposto pose with head tilted slightly to PL; radiating lines extending from head; dog seated on PL side of woman, looking up at her; mounted on blue paper
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over black chalk
provenance: Joseph F. McCrindle (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Saint Margaret of Cortona
